\u6c83.mnemonic: In good weather (夭) he adds water (氵) and <b>blueberry YOGUrt (ヨク)<b> to his vegetable patches to make them FERTILE.

\u4fb6.mnemonic: The parents hired a dubious person (亻) as a COMPANION for their little boy. He is to give the kid <b>a small blueberry from RIO (リョ) de Janeiro<b> every time the child gets the ロ sound (呂) right.

\u5442.mnemonic: <b>Little blue-eyed ROnan (ロ)<b> calls the walkway (ノ) between the rooms (口) a road. He runs along, practicing the ロ SOUND by singing "Ro, ro, ro, road!"
